page.title: 04CROSSCRAKE CHURCH ACTIVITIES
page.content: There are two services on Sundays-a{10a.m.}communion service and a {6.30p.m.}service. In addition on the first Sunday of the month there is a family service at{11.15 a.m. We have an{Adventurers group}on {Monday}after school for age{4_11}year olds at the vicarage.{Adventurers}is taken by {Mrs. Little, Mrs.Radley, {Mrs. Webster}and the{vicar.}There is a {Youth Group}for{11_16}year olds and they are taken by{Mr.and Mrs Pattinson and the{vicar}sometimes comes to help. On{Mondays}there is a{Mothers and {Toddlers group}at the vicarage where they have a dinner of fish fingers and chips.In summer the{church porch usually has a few{swallow nests}in it.
